vcluster.executors

Class CloudmanExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • vcluster.executors.CloudmanExecutor

  • public class CloudmanExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing Cloud manager executor. Cloud-related commands would be sent to this class and the commands will be analyzed, then corresponding functions will be invoked according the commands.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudmanExecutor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Cloud> getCloudList()
      list up all the registered clouds, the relevant information would be list up.
      static boolean hostoff(CmdComb cmd)
      Shut down a physical host.
      static boolean hoston(CmdComb cmd)
      Turn on a physical host
      static java.lang.String load(CmdComb cmd)
      Load a cloud into vcluster. command line would be analyzed and the corresponding function in cloud manager would be invoked.
      static java.lang.String register(CmdComb cmd)
      Execute the command of register clouds on vcluster step 1. analyze the command, extract the parameters step 2. invoke the corresponding function in cloud manager class and send the parameters.
      static boolean undefined(CmdComb cmd) 
      static boolean unload(CmdComb cmd)
      unload a cloud from vcluster. the cloud status would be change to "unloaded", and the connection between vcluster and related real cloud system would be cut off.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudmanExecutor

        public CloudmanExecutor()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static java.lang.String register(CmdComb cmd)
        Execute the command of register clouds on vcluster step 1. analyze the command, extract the parameters step 2. invoke the corresponding function in cloud manager class and send the parameters.
        Parameters:
        cmdLine, - the command line of register cloud from a conf file.

      • load

        public static java.lang.String load(CmdComb cmd)
        Load a cloud into vcluster. command line would be analyzed and the corresponding function in cloud manager would be invoked.

      • getCloudList

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Cloud> getCloudList()
        list up all the registered clouds, the relevant information would be list up.

      • undefined

        public static boolean undefined(CmdComb cmd)

      • unload

        public static boolean unload(CmdComb cmd)
        unload a cloud from vcluster. the cloud status would be change to "unloaded", and the connection between vcluster and related real cloud system would be cut off.

      • hoston

        public static boolean hoston(CmdComb cmd)
        Turn on a physical host

      • hostoff

        public static boolean hostoff(CmdComb cmd)
        Shut down a physical host.
